GLOBALS ############################################## ## HTTP REQUEST PARAMETERS #set($reqStep = $request.getParameter('step')) #set($reqSpaceName = $request.getParameter('spacename')) #set($reqDocumentName = $request.getParameter('documentname')) #set($reqConfirm = $request.getParameter('confirm')) #set($reqFormToken = $request.getParameter('form_token')) #set($reqID = $request.getParameter('id')) #set($reqXRedirect = $request.getParameter('xredirect')) ## GLOBAL VARIABLES #set($userId = $xcontext.getUser().replace('XWiki.', '')) #set($user = $services.eesc.getUser($userId)) ############################################## ## CONTROLLER ############################################## #controller() #macro(controller) #if($reqStep.equals('delete')) #deleteDocument($reqSpaceName, $reqDocumentName, $reqID, $reqFormToken, $reqConfirm, $reqXRedirect) #else #displayError() #end #end ############################################## ## ADD DATA ############################################## #* * Remove rights then delete the document * ----- * * Remove this document from the ShareListClass objects of profiles then redirect to the deletion page for the document * * @param $spaceName The name of the folder to create * @param $documentName The name of the document to create *# #macro(deleteDocument $spaceName $documentName $reqID $reqFormToken $reqConfirm $reqXRedirect) #set($querystring = "form_token=${reqFormToken}&confirm=${reqConfirm}") #if($reqID) #set($querystring = "${querystring}&id=${reqID}") #end #if($reqXRedirect) #set($querystring = "${querystring}&xredirect=${reqXRedirect}") #end #if(${languageparams} && !${languageparams.isEmpty()}) #set($querystring = "${querystring}&${languageparams}") #end #set($documentref = $services.model.resolveDocument("${spaceName}.${documentName}")) #set($shareScript = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage('EESCCode.GroovyAddRights')) #set($discard = $shareScript.deleteDocumentRights($documentref, [$xcontext, $xwiki, $services])) #set($discard = $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($documentref, 'delete', ''))) #end ############################################## ##
